locations.name: Old Festerland
locations.description: This 'city' is built on the edge of an old, stinking swamp.
textBlurbs: A young woman garbed for travel stops to talk with you. "Stock up first if you're heading to The Hanging Fort. It's a long road."
An old man, half caked in swamp muck eyes you with suspicion before moving on wordlessly.
An addled scrapper shuffles up to you, his whole body twitching. "Hey there traveler, you need any..." is all he gets out before being shooed away by a shopkeeper.
A guard eyes you, a look of disdain on her face. "Don't start any trouble, and move along."

locations.name: Shambles
locations.description: A relatively new settlement, it is built of scrap from the old world.

locations.name: Flint
locations.description: Built out of the ruins of an old mining town, though the mines have run dry.

locations.name: Crossroads
locations.description: More of a giant market than town, many caravans pass through here.

locations.name: Lost Pass
locations.description: Along a dangerous route over the mountains. Many travelers don't make it this far.

locations.name: Downstone
locations.description: The only remnant of what was here before, was a weathered sign bearing the name.

locations.name: Hangedman
locations.description: Home to a militant conclave, several dead bodies hang from the gates wearing signs describing their crimes.

locations.name: Last Bullet
locations.description: Established by a hunter, at the site of his most harrowing adventure.

locations.name: The Hanging Fort
locations.description: A bustling community of farmers, no one knows how it got its name.

locations.name: Long Road's Rest
locations.description: This waystop serves the few survivors of the Long Road.

locations.name: Silver Gulley
locations.description: The surrounding hills practically glitter with the now useless old world wealth.

locations.name: Lake Fishbone
locations.description: A once bustling fishing town, now clinging to a lake too acidic for life.

locations.name: Shatter Pass
locations.description: This settlment clings to life in a mountain range devestated by earthquakes.

locations.name: The Deeps
locations.description: This place marks the entrance to a series of old mining caves.

locations.name: Sunrise City
locations.description: A golden city on a hilltop, overrun with corruption and crime.

locations.name: Crow's Rest
locations.description: A city that's gotten its legs under it. There is a functioning government and power grid.
textBlurbs: "Another traveler!" a young woman exclaims excitedly. "You must tell us of your adventures!"

locations.name: UNKNOWN LOCATION
locations.description: YOU SHOULD NOT BE ABLE TO GET HERE
textBlurbs: An eerie voice whispers from a shadowy alley, "This place is not real. You are simply a figment of light, dancing on invisible marionette strings."
